description.p: Islamic prayer times (Adhan) and Qur'an application that is highly customizable, free and open source.
If you encounter a bug, want to add a language, want to contribute or just want to say Salam, join our discord server or subreddit!
Keywords: Athan, Adhan, Azan, Islam, Muslim, Prayers, times, Muezzin, Salah, Salat, Namaz, Islamic, Hijri, Quran, Qur'an, Koran.
Assalamou Alaykoum brothers/sisters and Ramadan Moubarak once again

ul.li: Added Qibla in settings page (middle of the footer).
Added custom times (you can input the times of your local mosque).
Added Jumuah time (friday prayer). It will automatically replace Dhuhr on Fridays.
Added calculation methods for France (12, 15 and 18), Gulf region and Russia.*
Added small blur effect on main page.
Fixed Spanish and French words for "Sunrise".

description.p: If there is any problem, please contact me so that I can fix it. If you have any ideas, I'd gladly hear them. Jazzakoum Allahu khairan.
*(no I don't support the Russian government, but I do support my Russian Muslim brothers)
